abstractText: A modern manuscript of the Dvāviṃśatyavadānakathā. This manuscript has been used by M. Okada for her edition (1993), where it is given the siglum C. According to the stemma codicum provided in the edition, this manuscript is the only witness of one distinct branch of the manuscript tradition, and is very near to the archetype.
